data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Herczek, Aleksander, Popov, Yuri A., Gorczyca, Jacek (2017): A new species of psallopinous plant bug from the Malay Peninsula (Heteroptera, Miridae, Psallopinae). ZooKeys 679: 47-53, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.679.13130, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.679.13130
